Text.Page:
, we need your help!

The {@LinkCreature:4#2021#shurian foe-hammers}, {@LinkCreature:4#2031#eldritch cardinals} and {@LinkCreature:4#2041#reavers}, as well as the {@LinkCreature:4#2051#raging arbosks} are hitting us hard. I want you to return the favor.

Report to Helone when your mission is complete.
You're a credit to the service. Thanks so much for the help!
You're almost there. Come back once you've fulfilled your orders.
